name: Cob & Popcorn Factory - A Crazy Chef Cooking Adventure
name_original: Cob & Popcorn Factory - A Crazy Chef Cooking Adventure
description:
Running a factory business is fun, in this awesome corn factory game you can not only run a commercial factory business as a little entrepreneur. Raw Corns are used to make tons of famous food items pop corn, corn oil , corn chips. In this factory simulator and cooking kitchen game you can cook tons of food items from raw corn. Make flavored popcorn, corn chips and corn flakes by extracting raw corn from fields. This is not only a popcorn maker game but you can try and test your skills extracting raw corn from the fields, peeling the corn and extracting corn

Maize extraction from fields:
Cultivate the raw maize from the fields, extract the maize kernels by scratching your fingers real time on your mobile screen from the corn cob.

Popcorn Maker Unit:
Cooking popcorn is fun. Take the maize kernel to the popcorn making unit, pour some oil in the cooking machine, heat the cooking plant and listen to the popping sound, pop the corns to perfection, remove them and add tons of mouth watering flavors & seasonings like butter, cheese salt and many more.

Corn Flakes making:
Take the maize kernels to corn flakes making plant and make this breakfast cereal by toasting flakes of the corn in a cooking machine.

Corn Chips making:
Make corn chips by kneading the corn flour and turning it into awesome shapes. Adds tons of flavors ad topping to the corn chips and make it more tasty.
